greenmirror.client

Class ModelTransition

  • java.lang.Object
    • greenmirror.client.ModelTransition

  • public class ModelTransition
extends Object
    A class that stores the execution of state-transitions. These instances should be defined by the model initializers. Whenever a transition is encountered on a trace that matches the pattern of an instance of ModelTransition, the code from the closure is executed and that should actually execute the state-transition. If the code (the Closure returns boolean false, further state-transitions are cancelled. This class is only used on the client side.
    Author:
    Karim El Assal

        the pattern to match transitions from a trace to

      • closure

        private groovy.lang.Closure<Object> closure
        the closure that holds the code that will be executed when this transition is encountered in a trace

      • duration

        private double duration
        the default duration of the transition animations. (in milliseconds); -1.0 for unspecified duration; 0 if you don't want animations to play

      • supplemental

        private boolean supplemental
        whether this model transition is supplementing another one

    • Constructor Detail

      • ModelTransition

        public ModelTransition()
        Creates a new model transition without any values set (yet).

      • ModelTransition

        public ModelTransition(@NonNull String regex,
                       groovy.lang.Closure<Object> closure,
                       double duration,
                       boolean supplemental)
        Creates a new model transition.
        Parameters:
        regex - a valid regex which compiles into a Pattern
        closure - see ModelTransition
        duration - see SetAnimationDurationCommand
        supplemental - whether this transition is supplemental to a previous or next one. If so, the controller won't send an EndTransitionCommand after this transition finishes

      • ModelTransition

        Parameters:
        regex - a valid regex which compiles into a Pattern
        closure - see ModelTransition
        duration - see SetAnimationDurationCommand

      • executableBy

        public boolean executableBy(@NonNull String traceTransition)
        Parameters:
        traceTransition - a transition given by a trace
        Returns:
        whether traceTransition is a match for this ModelTransition; false if getPattern() returns null

      • execute

        public Object execute(@NonNull String traceTransition)
        Executes the closure of this transition while extracting its optional arguments from traceTransition. If traceTransition doesn't match this transition's Pattern or the closure is null, nothing happens and null is returned.
        Parameters:
        traceTransition - a transition given by a trace.
        Returns:
        the return value of the Closure; null if traceTransition doesn't match the Pattern
